reviewText: I love history this is another set of DVD for my collection. arrive on time . very helpful  It good to see others remind you about the Civil rights movement what they went through.
I've thoroughly enjoyed this video!!!! I certainly plan on purchasing more!! I'm a huge fan of history. The content in this video really enlightened me!
I purchased this because my nephew had questions about the civil rights movement. Everyone in the family watched it and it was both educational and enjoyable. I highly recommend this product!
Watching this DVD is a powerful and moving experience; would highly recommend it to all.
